title: BRIEF-DFNN Inc's Unit Executes Agreement With AutoLotto To Provide Streaming Services
text:
BRIEF-DFNN Inc's Unit Executes Agreement With AutoLotto To Provide Streaming Services

Stock Markets 48 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 09:16)

BRIEF-DFNN Inc's Unit Executes Agreement With AutoLotto To Provide Streaming Services Oct 18 (Reuters) - DFNN Inc :

* UNIT EXECUTES AGREEMENT WITH AUTOLOTTO INC FOR UNIT TO

PROVIDE

LIVE STREAMING SERVICES FOR LOTTERY.COM



Source text for Eikon: company coverage: DFNN.PS



(Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

BRIEF-DFNN Inc's Unit Executes Agreement With AutoLotto To Provide Streaming Services
